name: 2020 GO AWAY
description:
It's time to get rid of the bad things in 2020, defeat the enemies with the power of sanitizer and TP (toilet paper) while you try to achieve the goal of pushing 2020 off the screen before you run out of time.

Controls :

This game is best played on android;

  • 2 clicks to shoot the TP (toilet paper).
  • 1 click to spray the sanitizer (reloaded/refill needed).
  • HOLD the wheel to push 2020 being careful with the patience bar (if it breaks press the start button).

The game was originally made for me and my daughters as a sort of The walking dead game with characters Rick, Daryl and Carl.

But we never finished this game before, until now.

I hope you enjoy the game and let's wish for a better year, stay safe!
